subject: RE: [junit] Re: Error while using junit.swingui.TestRunner - ( Se	rver - WebLogic )
msgSnippet: ... Sure. You are trying to use a Swing-based program on a Unix/Linux server. In order to do this, you need to have an available x11 console (the graphical
messageBody:
> Could you elaborate on that ?
> I tried on my client machine and it works and I use Windows 2000 if
> that is of any significance

Sure.

You are trying to use a Swing-based program on a Unix/Linux server. In order
to do this, you need to have an available x11 console (the graphical
interface under Unix). You do not get this sort of interface over, say, a
telnet session.

Without that, you get the sort of exception you are seeing. Stick to using
the textui runner on your server.

Robert.
